## TwilioErrors.MalformedRequestErrors.MalformedRequestError.solutions property

Ensure the message object contains a valid CallSid. Ensure the message object contains a valid VoiceEventSid. Ensure the message object has a valid payload. Ensure the message object has a valid message type.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
solutions: string[];
```
